title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 88.3 - Exhibit e-3: underground construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 88.3 - Exhibit e-3: underground construction

State Regulations

If any portion of the proposed transmission line is to be
built underground, the applicant shall: (a) indicate the type of cable system to be
used; (b) provide the design
standards for that system; (c) indicate the number and size of conductors to be used; and
(d) indicate, on a profile of the line: (1)
the depth of the cable; and
(2)
the location of oil pumping stations and
manholes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
88.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
